version.description: The version of the version to be parsed

jobs.description: The list of jobs to be run in ci

script.description: the list of instruction to be executed for that job

image.description: the docker image to run the job into

skip_if.description: A shell ($SHELL) is invoked with the string, and if its exit code is zero, the job is skipped.

groups.description: The list and ordering of available groups in ci

contraints.description: The constraints to add to the jobs scheduling

display.description: The configuration how qad should output the jobs

env.description: The env to be calculated and injected within the ci jobs
